title: What are the options I have if I leave my current internship (8th Sem)
content: I have completed one month of internship in a company and now I want to leave it due to personal reasons. I also have a placement offer in hand. My question is if I leave how will I get credits? Is it possible to take up special topics this late?

comments.body: Sounds like you will need to ask the department only. If no ISAs have taken place till now, theoretically you should still be able to register.
